Question: Gopod Group Holding Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Gopod Group Holding Limited

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- New Qi2 products launch
- Showcasing innovative items
- Over 13 years of production experience
- Specializes in computer and mobile phone accessories
- Notable presence in R&D, production, and sales
- Two factories in Shenzhen and Foshan, China
- Covers a total area of 35,000 square meters
- Employs more than 1,500 staff
